title: my champion idea 2
body:
(still working on it thought you guy could watch it happen)

Name: Walter

Title: the void hunter (he hunts the void)

Passive: gains a on hit effect scaling with 5% of mana

Q: next aa does 20/40/60/80/100 + 10/20/30/40/50% ad and 1/2/3/4/5% mana ratio punches his enemy with his mana gauntlet

W: its a dash

E: after 1 second heal for 30/60/90/120/150 + 20% ap and 3% mana ratio

R: gains a buff granting 50/75/100 ad and ap and movespeed however it drains 5% of your hp as you use it auto stops at 10% hp (toggle ability)

Lore/Story: Walter come from a contry that has been consumed be the void in a desperate attempt to avenge all his fallen comrades he travels into the heart of the void in hopes to confront whoever controlls the void however when he entered the void it almost killed him and he couldnt advance much further forced to turn back he left the void however he found himself in anoher place he had entered valoran thinking of this as a second chance he has decided to defend this land from the void.

replies.body: like last time powerful and interesting
